original_title: King Crimson: The Noise (Live at Frejus)
overview: A concert by King Crimson recorded at the Arena Frejus, France on August 27th, 1982.  Track Listing:  Waiting Man,  Matte Kudasai,  The Sheltering Sky,  Neil and Jack and Me,  Indiscipline,  Heartbeat,  Larks' Tongues In Aspic Part II and more.
title: King Crimson: The Noise (Live at Frejus)
